name: Nop.Payment.SagePayToken
short_description:
This is a functional SagePay Tokenization Class for use with NopCommerce 1.80
You will need to set these fields as 'Settings' inside of the Nop Administration Interface.

The Appropriate Values are listed in the SagePayDocumentation and may vary.

SagePayToken.Checkout.UserError
SagePayToken.VPSProtocol
SagePayToken.Vendor
SagePayToken.TokenRegistrationNotificationUrl
SagePayToken.AccountType
SagePayToken.SagePayConnectionType

You also need the Server Application located by clicking my username.

Extract both files under:

SagePayToken.rar -> NopCommerce\NopCommerceStore\Templates\Payment
Nop.Payment.SagePayToken.zip -> NopCommerce\Payment
